title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 328.7 - Responsibilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 328.7 - Responsibilities

State Regulations

The secretary of the State University shall serve as
secretary of the board and its committees, shall keep records of their
proceedings and shall furnish minutes of such proceedings to the members of the
board and its committees, respectively. The secretary shall be the custodian of
the university seal and shall maintain a complete file of all reports of the
board and its committees and perform such other duties as may be assigned by
the board or any of its committees. The secretary shall perform such other
powers and duties and have such other responsibilities, not inconsistent with
responsibilities to the board of trustees, as may be assigned by the
chancellor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
328.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
